channel.title: Rls on Tin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rls on Tin's Blog

item.title: Instruction Navigation
item.description: In this post, I want to introduce a hot topic in Reinforcement Learning which is Instruction Navigation. Although Navigation can be tackled by using Supervised Learning, but using Reinforcement Learning help us learn without any human-labeled data. Link paper: Paper Link code: Code The content is as following: 1. Introduction to Instruction Navigation 2. Principle 3. Methodology 3.1 Image Representation Module 3.2 Text Representation Module 3.3 Attented Representation Module 3.4 Policy Learning 4.
